data.title: Rising Named To Walter Camp Player of the Year Watch List
data.meta_description: NEW HAVEN, Conn. – University of Utah Football quarterback Cameron Rising has been named to the 2024 Walter Camp Player of the Year Watch List. He is one of 50 "players
data.text:
NEW HAVEN, Conn. – University of Utah Football quarterback Cameron Rising has been named to the 2024 Walter Camp Player of the Year Watch List. He is one of 50 "players to watch", which includes 20 quarterbacks.

Rising was a semifinalist for the Maxwell Award in 2022 along with the Davey O'Brien Award after being named All-Pac-12 and the MVP of the Pac-12 title game. He is a two-time all-conference selection, earning first-team in 2021, holding an overall win record of 18-6, which is tied for fifth all-time at Utah.

The Ventura, Calif., native enters the 2024 season with 15 career games with 200+ passing yards, including two 300-yard games and one 400-yard game. In back-to-back seasons (2021, 2022), Rising ranked in the top-10 in ESPN's QBR Rating, including a No. 6 rating in 2021.

In just 27 career games (25 starts), Rising already ranks in the top-10 all-time at Utah in career completions (7th, 456), touchdown passes (T-6th, 46) and passing yards (7th, 5,572). He also ranks third all-time in career passing efficiency (147.38) and is fourth in completion percentage (.641).

FOLLOW UTAH FOOTBALL ON SOCIAL MEDIA!

Follow along with behind the scenes content and coverage throughout the season on social media through Twitter, Instagram, Facebook and TikTok along with visiting www.UtahUtes.com.

PRESEASON AWARDS TRACKER

UtahUtes.com will keep a running tally of preseason, in-season and post-season awards all through '24 as the Utes look to have another standout campaign on and off the gridiron. Click here to follow along.

Players Mentioned

#7 Cameron Rising

QB
